No. 200846)} Sub: Start of Construction by Contractor Concessionaire before appointed date- reg: Appointed Date' is considered as date of commencement of project' or commencement of concession period for public funded PPP projects. As per standard provisions of Contract Agreements Concession Agreements, no construction activity shall be allowed before declaration of appointed date. However , multiple cases have been noticed where contractors/ concessionaires have undertaken construction work before declaration of appointed date. Competent Authority has taken serious note of this. 2 Hence, all technical divisions, ROs/PDs are directed to strictly ensure that only those activities which are permitted in accordance with Contract Agreements Concession Agreements, shall be allowed before appointed date and construction work shall not start before declaration of appointed date: Breach of agreement in this regard will result in action against concerned Independent Engineer Authority Engineer & Project Director . 3 This issues with the approval of Competent Authority. 23| (Sanjay Kumar Patel) General Manager (Coord.)
